product_overview: Sazonal Chef is a Brazilian culinary assistant app designed to transform the cooking routine into an efficient, enjoyable experience by intelligent meal planning, reducing food waste, and motivating users through gamification. It provides curated high-quality recipes, weekly menu planning, automatic shopping lists, and a rewarding user engagement system.
core_goals: Enable users to easily discover, search, and filter a high-quality, standardized recipe catalog.
Provide personalized weekly menu planning with options for manual input and AI-generated suggestions.
Automatically generate and organize intelligent shopping lists based on planned menus to avoid waste and streamline grocery shopping.
Motivate users to cook and engage with the app through a comprehensive gamification system including points, levels, and badges.
Maintain a cohesive, user-friendly interface aligned with the brand’s visual identity for a professional and seamless user experience.
key_features: Complete Authentication System with login, registration, password recovery, and user management.
Recipe Management with search, filtering by category/diet/time, and detailed, clear recipe presentation following a "Padrão Ouro" standard.
Menu Planning System allowing weekly menu creation, AI suggestions, meal slotting, and recipe substitutions.
Intelligent Shopping List Builder that consolidates ingredients across recipes, converts units, and categorizes items for easy shopping.
Gamification System tracking user cooking activity, awarding points, levels, and badges to boost motivation.
User Profile and Settings management including preferences, notifications, and privacy.
Saved Recipes system for managing and accessing favorite recipes with persistence.
Progressive Web App features ensuring offline support, push notifications, and easy app installation.
Consistent UI components and responsive navigation including bottom navigation and scroll-to-top functionality.
Toast Notifications for consistent user feedback and error handling.
Integration with Supabase for data services and backend operations.
Reusable custom React hooks for enhanced state and data management.
End-to-end testing suite for critical user flows ensuring product stability and quality.
user_flow_summary: Users start by registering or logging in via the authentication system.
After login, users explore and search recipes in the catalog, using filters to find desired dishes.
Users view detailed recipe pages optimized for reading during cooking, with standardized ingredient and instruction formatting.
Users create weekly menus manually or via AI-generated suggestions and can replace recipes or avoid duplication.
Once a menu is saved, an automatic shopping list is generated, consolidating ingredients and organizing by category for easy shopping.
Users track their cooking progress and achievements through their profile linked to the gamification system.
Users can save favorite recipes for quick access anytime.
All user preferences, notification settings, and account details can be managed in profile and settings pages.
The app supports offline use and push notifications via PWA features for uninterrupted experience.
validation_criteria: Search functionality returns relevant results by name or ingredient.
Filters for category, diet, and cooking time work correctly and reflect on search results.
Recipes conform to the "Padrão Ouro" standard with proper ingredient display and correct formatting.
Recipe pages occupy the full screen for optimal usability during cooking.
Weekly menu planning supports creation, AI-generation, recipe substitution, duplicate detection, and saving.
Shopping lists are automatically generated, consolidated, categorized, and interactive.
Gamification correctly tracks points, levels, and displays progress to users.
The app UI matches the defined color palette, logo, text standards, and navigation flows.
Authentication system functions fully including login, registration, password recovery, and protected routes.
PWA capabilities such as offline support and push notifications are fully operational.
End-to-end tests cover critical user flows including authentication, navigation, profile management, recipes, and shopping list.
